author: stoddard
msg: Win32: Shutdown the listeners before telling the accept threads to quit.

author: stoddard
msg: Win32: Use atomic increment/decrement on counters touched by multiple threads.
I intentionally did not use atomic operators on the Win9* code paths.

msg: Exporting a missing API for NetWare

author: wrowe
msg: We appear to never have had any complaints about copy srcname dstname
not overwriting dstname ... this flavor is certain not to emit a file
exists error [with the obvious caviat - if it's write protected, your
problem.]  Much simpler than /y, <.y or set copycmd fooness.
